attributes.action: Ban alchohol sales throughout the UK for health reasons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a democratic country we have freedom of speech?! Why then are we being dictated to with the decision to ban smoking in public places? I agree smoking does put a strain on the NHS, but if every one stopped smoking, how much would our taxes increase?
The natural way forward would be to ban alchohol. How much of a strain is alchohol related health problems costing the NHS? How much for Policing? Is it possible that there is a vested interest in the sale of alchohol? No, surely not! Are we a democracy any more? I think not. Our freedom of choice is being taken away from us. What a sad decline for this once, very respected island.
